sources.title: Desire
sources.description: Title: Desire Summary: An automotive engineer bound for a holiday in Spain meets a sultry jewel thief. Directed by: Frank Borzage Actors: Marlene Dietrich, Gary Cooper, John Halliday Production Company: Paramount Pictures Release Date: 28 February 1936 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Madeleine steals a string of pearls in Paris and uses US engineer Tom, who is driving on his vacation to Spain, to get the pearls out of France, but getting the pearls, back from him proves to be difficult without falling in love.

metadata.Plot: Madeleine steals a string of pearls in Paris and uses US engineer Tom, who is driving on his vacation to Spain, to get the pearls out of France, but getting the pearls, back from him proves to be difficult without falling in love.
